sentences.sContent: Interestingly, none of their three children ever married.
sentences.sCn: 有趣的是，他们的三个孩子都一直没有结婚。

sentences.sContent: Interestingly enough, Pearson made no attempt to deny the rumour.
sentences.sCn: 很有趣的是，皮尔逊没有试图否认谣传。

words.tran: 有趣的；引起兴趣的，令人关注的
感兴趣的；有权益的；有成见的
兴趣，爱好；利息；趣味；同行
使……感兴趣；引起……的关心；使……参与

trans.tranOther: used to introduce a fact that you think is interesting
